summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to The Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing the acceptance of revenues from vendor fees, merchandise and food sales generated from The Seattle Aquarium 4th Annual Salmon Homecoming Celebration, and other donations and contributions made in support of this event, increasing the expenditure allowances in the Department's 1996 budget, and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Parks and Recreation Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
